content.title: Nanaji Deshmukh Krishi Sanjivani Prakalp
content.details: The Nanaji Deshmukh Krishi Sanjivani Prakalp (NDKSP) aims to provide financial assistance to small and marginal farmers for implementing climate-resilient agricultural practices.
benefits: Financial assistance up to 80% for implementing climate-resilient activities
Training sessions for farmers on climate-resilient farming techniques
eligibility: Small and marginal farmers with land holdings up to 5 Ha
Farmers from villages included in the NDKSP scheme
exclusions: Farmers with land holdings greater than 5 Ha are not eligible
Villages not included in the NDKSP scheme are not eligible for financial assistance
content.application_process: Farmers can apply through the NDKSP portal or mobile app after registering with their Aadhaar number.

faqs.question: What are the benefits to the farmers offered under NDKSP scheme?
faqs.answer: Small and marginal farmers with land holding up to 5 Ha will get financial assistance up to 80% for implementing climate resilient activities such as drip, sprinklers, farm-pond, shade-net, poly-tunnels, etc on their farms.

faqs.question: If I have 2 Ha land in the project region and my village is included in the scheme, can I apply for 30x30x12 Mtr farm-pond on my farm?
faqs.answer: Yes. You are eligible for applying for the given activity.

faqs.question: What is the mode of payment from NDKSP and when will I get paid?
faqs.answer: The project has implemented back-ended financial assistance. You need to apply for the activity, and after completion and inspection, the financial assistance will be disbursed to your Aadhaar linked Bank account.

faqs.question: What can I do if my village is not included in NDKSP scheme?
faqs.answer: If your village is not included, you are not eligible for financial assistance, but you may utilize agro-climatic advisories and attend training sessions.

faqs.question: Does NDKSP project provide handholding and training sessions of the farmers to adopt climate resilient farming techniques?
faqs.answer: Yes, under the Farm Field School initiative, training sessions are conducted for farmers in demo plots.

faqs.question: I am a member of Farmer Producing Organization, are there any activities for which I can apply for?
faqs.answer: Yes, Farmer Producing Organizations from the districts covered under NDKSP are eligible to apply for multiple activities designed for Agribusiness promotion.

faqs.question: I am a farmer with less than 1 Ha land in NDKSP region, am I eligible to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, you are eligible for the application.

faqs.question: If I am having more than 5 Ha of the land in NDKSP region, am I eligible to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: No, farmers with land holdings greater than 5 Ha are not eligible to apply.

faqs.question: I am a landless farmer however I want to apply for the activity which doesn’t need land, am I eligible to apply and what additional document am I supposed to be produced?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can apply for certain activities and need to provide a landless farmer certificate.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility for applying to shade-net?
faqs.answer: Your land holding should be less than 5 Ha and you should have funds to implement the activity.

faqs.question: I am a farmer from NDKSP village and want to apply for the activity which is listed in the scheme, what is the process for application?
faqs.answer: Visit the NDKSP portal or mobile app, register using your Aadhaar number, and apply for available activities.

faqs.question: Can I start the work on the activity which I have applied for post application on NDKSP portal?
faqs.answer: You can start the work after receiving Pre-Sanction from the office of SDAO.

faqs.question: If my Aadhaar is not linked with any bank account, how will I get financial assistance from NDKSP scheme?
faqs.answer: You need to link your Aadhaar card with your bank account to receive financial benefits.

faqs.question: I have received an SMS that disbursement is made on my account for the activity which I have completed, however, I haven’t received the funds in my account. What should I do?
faqs.answer: Visit Citizen Service Centre to activate your Aadhaar.

faqs.question: After activating my Aadhaar number, in how many days will I get the financial assistance for the activity which I have already completed?
faqs.answer: Inform NDKSP officials about the activation, and they will process your funds as soon as available.
